mean_cn: n.界面；【地质】分界面，接触面
mean_en: the way a computer program presents information to a user or receives information from a user, in particular the layout of the screen and the menus
sentence: The most important part of a tablet computer is its user interface.
sentence_trans: 平板电脑最重要的部分就是它的用户界面。
word_etyma: inter在…之间，相互 + face脸，面 → interface界面；分界面，接触面
